text: After some testing, it oddly has worked displaying the correct CTAs dependent on device type even on outlook. Not sure how this is actually working but will keep in mind its effectiveness but worth mentioning.
I think that's the issue, it generates code. It would be great if the D&D interface was purely to shuffle pre-made chunks of code around.
Things like dark mode, accessibility, srcset, max-widths, custom fonts etc, are they supported?
